input:
Algne HTML-tootekirjeldus (sh k√µik pildid) on all. Kirjuta see ja varasemates sammudes kogutud konteksti p√µhjal √ºmber loomulikuks eestikeelseks tootekirjelduseks, s√§ilitades k√µik algsed -elemendid (sama src) ja j√§rgides √ºlaltoodud struktuuri. ORIGINAALNE_HTML_KIRJELDUS:

7000 MealAssist with SteamCrisp

Metal black anodized handle

1 Cake tray grey enamel;1 Dripping pan grey enamel,¬†1¬†Steam glass pot

30-300¬∞C

Tender, crispy and delicious food with steam

Tender, crispy and delicious food with steam The 7000 MealAssist Oven with SteamCrisp¬Æ combines steam and traditional heat for more flavour and nutrition in your cooking. SteamCrisp¬Æ makes meat jucier and fish is up to 20% more tender compared to a non-steam oven. And the display guides you for flawless results Experience amazing tenderness with SteamCrisp¬Æ Oven ‚Äì enjoy succulent meat and elevate your fish dishes with up to 20% greater tenderness. Disclaimer: Based on external test comparing tenderness of chicken (up to 4% more) and salmon (up to 20% more) cooked with and without combining steam and hot air.

SteamCrisp¬Æ ‚Äì keeps dishes crispy outside and juicy inside

SteamCrisp¬Æ ‚Äì keeps dishes crispy outside and juicy inside The SteamCrisp¬Æ multifunction oven combines heat and steam to bake, roast and reheat. This combination keeps dishes crispy on the outside and juicy on the inside ‚Äì meat is jucier and fish is up to 20% more tender vs a non-steam oven. Based on external test comparing tenderness of chicken (up to 4% more) and salmon (up to 20% more) cooked with and without combining steam and hot air.

CookSmart Touch. Smart cooking at your fingertips

CookSmart Touch. Smart cooking at your fingertips The CookSmart Touch display with swipe navigation lets you receive cooking tips and select oven functions. And with energy-saving tips, you can cook more efficiently. Your favourite dishes and methods can be saved on the app and sent to the oven at the touch of a button.‚Äã

Let AI transform your recipes with steam

Let AI transform your recipes with steam AI TasteAssist transforms traditional recipes with steam. Simply send a web recipe to your oven via our app and let AI optimise the time, temperature and function, helping you create more nutritious, delicious dishes with less energy. AI TasteAssist is an AEG app feature that can import recipes in Italian, French, German, English, Swedish and Dutch. Languages to be added throughout 2025 are Polish, Czech, Hungarian, Romanian, Norwegian and Danish. The AEG is available in the App Store and Play Store.

Functions and Dishes. Automatic settings and step-by-step guidance

Functions and Dishes. Automatic settings and step-by-step guidance Assisted cooking Functions provide the best settings and automatic options such as Roast, Reheat and Dough Prove for outstanding results. And the Assisted Dishes function offers step-by-step guidance for meat, baking, cooking plant-based dishes, fish or vegetables.

Pyrolytic Cleaning. The self-cleaning function

Pyrolytic Cleaning. The self-cleaning function Using high temperature, the Pyrolytic Cleaning function turns grease and food residue into ash ‚Äì so you can easily wipe it off with a damp cloth.
